sys_soap_message_function.envelope:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:examples:helloservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <!-- http://senduser.getsandbox.com/SayHello/ --> <!-- https://integration-stagdup2.eztest.nu/servicenow -->
<soapenv:Body> <urn:sendUser soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">
<object xsi:type="xsd:string">USER</object>
<reseller xsi:type="xsd:string">${reseller}</reseller> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">${company}</company>
<sysid xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_id}</sysid> <department xsi:type="xsd:string">${department}</department> <cost_center xsi:type="xsd:string">${cost_center}</cost_center> <email xsi:type="xsd:string">${email}</email> <employee_number xsi:type="xsd:string">${employee_number}</employee_number> <first_name xsi:type="xsd:string">${first_name}</first_name> <mid_name xsi:type="xsd:string">${mid_name}</mid_name> <last_name xsi:type="xsd:string">${last_name}</last_name> <location xsi:type="xsd:string">${location}</location> <roles xsi:type="xsd:string">${roles}</roles> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">${name}</name> <user_name xsi:type="xsd:string">${user_name}</user_name> <active xsi:type="xsd:string">${active}</active> <mobile_phone xsi:type="xsd:string">${mobile_phone}</mobile_phone> <preferred_language xsi:type="xsd:string">${preferred_language}</preferred_language> <last_login xsi:type="xsd:string">${last_login}</last_login>
</urn:sendUser> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
